DOC.brief_summary: Current study aims to analyze the outcomes of j-pouch and side-to-end anastomosis in rectal cancer patients treated with laparoscopic hand-assisted low anterior resection
DOC.brief_title: J-Pouch vs Side-to-End Anastomosis After Hand-Assisted Laparoscopic Low Anterior Resection for Rectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: patients with rectal cancer which is located up to 12 cm from the dentate line observed with a rigid rectosigmoidoscope refusal of the patient to participate pregnancy, previous radiation therapy, those have cancers other than adenocarcinoma, those planned to have local excision or abdominoperineal resection
